projects.name: Twitter Clone
projects.description: Developed a Twitter clone using Tailwind CSS and Node.js, demonstrating proficiency in full-stack web development. Emphasised clean code architecture and user-centric design principles, resulting in a modern and functional platform.

projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive full-stack e-commerce website using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js). Implemented user authentication, Enhanced user experience with a responsive design and seamless navigation. Integrated RESTful APIs for efficient data handling and ensured robust performance through optimised backend services.

projects.name: House Price Prediction
projects.description: Implemented a machine learning solution for predicting house prices, leveraging Python libraries such as Scikit-learn and Pandas. Gathered and preprocessed real estate data to train and validate the model, demonstrating expertise in data cleaning and feature engineering. Utilised regression algorithms to accurately forecast house prices based on key variables.
